explanation: [0-0] In the middle, a person is dressed in a black witch costume, wearing a pointed hat, holding a stick in one hand and another stick between their legs. On the left, a person in a blue shirt and dark pants is kneeling on the ground with their hands clasped, looking at the witch. On the right, another person in a black coat and black pants is also kneeling, hands clasped, looking at the witch. The background is a white wall.
[0-2] The witch laughs and waves her arms, while the two kneeling people beg for mercy.

[2-4] Then the Hulk appears from the right, roaring, which scares the witch, causing her to run to the left.

[4-7] The camera follows the witch as she escapes, finally returning to the Hulk. The Hulk glares angrily at the two men kneeling on the ground, who look back at him in terror.
